name: Nitcy's Adventure Demo
description:
Nitcy's Adventure Public Demo is finally here! Play 1 level of the first world to have a concept/idea/prewiew of the game. It's release will be on the 29th august 2023, and it's a SNES like game with a retro concept: Play as Berry, or Play as Nitcy! Browse trough extras, get cherries and good luck.

Hope you enjoy this game!

Thanks.
